title: Kerning
content:
Let me know what you think of this kerning. I am growing blind on this long word…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [T35kerning.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061118044929/http:/typophile.com/files/T35kerning.jpg) | 34.72 KB |
author: WorkOslo

comments.content:
Maybe more between ‘S’ and ‘E’, ‘A’ and ‘T’, and less between ‘S’ and ‘G’.  
Your ‘Work’ mark is wonderful.
It won’t matter much until the alignments of the round characters S, G, overlap the square characters enough to look equal, as opposed to too short.
